Comment: Abilities: A0ZA (Warsong Battle Standard), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: Places a battle standard, giving bonus regeneration and armor to friendly units next to the banner.|nLasts 25 seconds. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 750 hit points gives a 50% regeneration increase and 10 armor. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - 950 hit points gives a 100% regeneration increase and 10 armor.|n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 1250 hit points gives a 150% regeneration increase and 10 armor.
